monster.name: Animated Ballista
senses: visió a cegues 120 peus (sense visió més enllà)

action.name: Magic Bolt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de foc

monster.name: Animated Staff
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Wielder Domination
entries: A creature can grab the staff out of the air with a successful grapple check against the staff, and grappling the staff does not reduce the creature's speed. Any creature that successfully grapples the staff ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition charmed} by the staff until the staff is no longer in its grasp. While the creature is {@condition charmed}, the staff can issue commands to it, which the creature does its best to obey. The creature can repeat the saving throw each time it takes damage, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that successfully resists the staff's control can't be {@condition charmed} by it for 24 hours.

A creature holding the staff that isn't {@condition charmed} by it can use an action to attempt to break the staff over a knee or against a solid surface, doing so with a successful {@dc 17} Força ({@skill Atletisme}) check. Breaking the staff in this manner destroys it.

action.name: Staff of Frost
entries: The staff has 10 charges. It can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save {@dc 12}): {@spell con de fred} (5 charges), {@spell núvol de boira} (1 charge), {@spell tempesta de gel} (4 charges), or {@spell wall of ice} (4 charges). It regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If the staff expends its last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff turns to water and is destroyed.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent mes 1 cold damage.

monster.name: Animated Statue of Lolth

items.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The statue pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

languages: understands Abyssal però no pot parlar

monster.name: Animated Stove
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Belch Fire {@recharge 4}
entries: The stove belches fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 10}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Wand of Wonder
entries: The animated wand can expend 1 of its charges and target a random creature with one of its {@item wand of wonder||randomly determined effects}. Any such effect that would target the wand's user targets the wand instead. If reduced to 0 hit points, the wand crumbles into dust and is destroyed.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Arcturia is an 18th-level spellcaster. Her habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Arcturia can cast {@spell ego alteració} at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Ashtyrranthor's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma. Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

items.name: Extra Parts
entries: Com a acció bonus, Berlain can use her extra mouth and arms to cast any cantrip she has prepared.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Berlain is an 18th-level spellcaster. Her habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Berlain can cast ego camuflatge and invisibility at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: *Berlain casts these spells on herself before combat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The xorn fa tres atacs d'Urpa.and one bite attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d6 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The worm regains 10 hit points a l'inici de cada torn seu si té 1 punt de cop com a mínim.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The worm fa dos atacs: one with its grinding jaws and one with its stinger.

action.name: Grinding Jaws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19}. Qui falli rep 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Tied Down
entries: While lashed to the floor, the creature is {@condition prone} and {@condition restrained}. It also suffers from two levels of {@condition exhaustion}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The creature fa dos atacs: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o estar {@condition poisoned} durant 1 minut. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the poison on itself on a success.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Cassiok carries a {@item staff of power} that grants him a +2 bonus to Armor Class, spell attack rolls, and saving throws. His insectoid physiology prevents him from making melee attacks with the staff. If reduced to 20 hit points or fewer, Cassiok uses his next action to break his staff in a retributive strike.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Cassiok is an 18th-level spellcaster. His habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 19} salvada de conjur, {@hit 11} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Cassiok can cast ego camuflatge and invisibility at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: *Cassiok casts these spells on himself before combat.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant.

items.name: Illumination
entries: The gòlem magically desprèn llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals. This light goes out when the gòlem is destroyed.

items.name: Light Intensity
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the illuminated gòlem and can see the gòlem must succeed on a DC 17 Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of the creature's next turn.

A creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the gòlem fins a l'inici del seu següent torn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the gòlem in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

items.name: Third Arm
entries: The duergar can make an attack with its javelin as a bonus action.

items.name: Merged Heads
entries: The duergar has advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

items.name: Warp Reality
entries: As a bonus action on her turn, Dezmyr can warp reality, undoing damage dealt to herself or another creature that she can see within 20 feet of her. The beneficiary of this warped reality instantly regains 10 hit points.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Dezmyr és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 19. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de paladí preparats:

items.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: Drivvin magically summons a {@filter demon amb un valor de repte de 6 o menor|bestiary|challenge rating=[&0;&6]|tag=demon|miscellaneous=!swarm}. The summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of him, acts as his ally, and can't summon other demons. The summoned demon remains until Drivvin dismisses it as an action or until the demon is reduced to 0 hit points.

items.name: Hurl Fire
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) de dany de foc.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Ezzat wears an {@item amulet of proof against detection and location}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Ezzat is an 18th-level spellcaster. His habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troll fa sis atacs: one with its bite and five with its claws.

items.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and the drow no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

items.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the drow té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The drow és Carisma (spell save DC 15). The drow pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

items.name: Enlarge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the senyor de les mòmies magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the senyor de les mòmies is Large, doubles its damage dice with its Rotting Fist attack, and makes Força checks and Força saving throws with advantage. If the senyor de les mòmies lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

items.name: Invisibility (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The senyor de les mòmies magically turns {@condition invisible} for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it casts a spell, it uses its Enlarge, or its concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the senyor de les mòmies wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

The stalagmite in the northwest alcove is hollow and serves as Gorka Tharn's sarcophagus. The senyor de les mòmies is lodged inside the stalagmite's funnel-shaped interior. When it awakens, the senyor de les mòmies uses a {@spell stone shape} spell to create an opening large enough for it to emerge. It destroys any intruders in its lair, then returns to its sarcophagus and its slumber.

At the bottom of the stalagmite's hollow cavity, four 1-foot-tall clay urns contain Gorka Tharn's preserved internal organs, including the senyor de les mòmies's shriveled heart. Only by destroying the heart can the characters prevent the senyor de les mòmies from rejuvenating. The heart is a Tiny object with AC 5, 25 hit points, and immunity to all damage except fire.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The senyor de les mòmies és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The senyor de les mòmies has the following cleric spells prepared:

monster.name: Gorzil's Gang Troglodyte

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troglodyte fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its longsword.

items.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

languages: understands Undercommon però no pot parlar

resist.note: (granted by the blast scepter, see "Special Equipment" below)

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Halaster és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 20. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 22} salvada de conjur, {@hit 14} a impactar amb atacs màgics). He can cast {@spell ego camuflatge} and {@spell invisibility} at will. He can cast {@spell volar} and {@spell lightning bolt} once each without expending a spell slot, but can't do so again until he finishes a short or long rest. Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Halaster wears a robe of eyes that lets him see in all directions, gives him darkvision out to a range of 120 feet, grants advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight, and allows him to see {@condition invisible} creatures and objects, as well as into the Pla Etèri, out to a range of 120 feet.

Halaster wields a blast scepter (a very rare magic item that requires attunement). It can be used as an arcane focus. Whoever is attuned to the blast scepter gains resistance to fire and lightning damage and can, com a acció, use it to cast thunderwave as a 4th-level spell (save {@dc 16}) without expending a spell slot.
Halaster also wears a horned ring (a very rare magic item that requires attunement), which allows an attuned wearer to ignore Undermountain's magical restrictions (see "Alterations to Magic").

trait.name: Arcane Recovery (1/Dia)
entries: When he finishes a short rest, Halaster recovers all his spell slots of 5th level and lower.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Halaster falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: If Halaster dies in Undermountain, he revives after {@dice 1d10} days, with all his hit points and any missing body parts restored. His new body appears in a random safe location in Undermountain.

action.name: Blast Scepter
entries: Halaster uses his blast scepter to cast thunderwave as a 4th-level spell. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from him ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep {@dice 5d8} de dany de tro and is pushed 10 feet away. Si supera en rep la meitat and isn't pushed

legendary.name: Cast Spell
entries: Halaster casts a spell of 3rd level or lower.

legendary.name: Spell Ward (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Halaster expends a spell slot of 4th level or lower and gains 5 temporary hit points per level of the slot.

items.name: Spell Immunity
entries: The Halaster horror is immune to the {@spell con de fred}, {@spell desintegrar}, and {@spell bola de foc} spells.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Halaster horror makes two staff attacks.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Debilitat Antimàgica
entries: The puppet is destroyed if a successful dissipar màgia spell ({@dc 15}) is cast on it

trait.name: Salt Sensitivity
entries: A pound of salt thrown onto the snail's skin deals {@dice 1d6} de dany d'àcid to the creature.

trait.name: Magical Properties
entries: A creature that uses an action to touch the living snail gains 6 temporary hit points that last for 24 hours. Any creature or object that touches the living snail also gains the benefit of a {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell. The snail loses these magical properties if it dies.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The snail pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Com a acció, it can make two attacks with its pseudòpodes.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid, o 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany d'àcid while the ooze is enlarged. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

action.name: Enlarge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the ooze magically increases in size. While enlarged, the ooze is Gargantuan, doubles its damage dice with its pseudòpode attack, and makes Força checks and Força saving throws with advantage.

action.name: Invisibility (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The ooze magically turns {@condition invisible} for up to 1 hour until it attacks, it uses its Enlarge, or its concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell).

monster.name: Intelligent Black Pudding
languages: Elvish and Undercommon però no pot parlar

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The pudding's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It can cast the following spells, sense requerir components:

monster.name: Iron Spider
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

action.name: Web Cable
entries: The iron spider shoots out a 6-inch-thick web cable up to 50 feet long, attaching the far end of the cable to a solid surface up to 50 feet away from it. Com a acció bonus, it can detach the other end of the cable from itself and attach it to a solid surface within 10 feet of it. Once it creates 200 feet of web cable, the spider can't produce any more cable until the next dawn.

items.name: Children of the Night (1/Dia)
entries: The vampire magically calls {@dice 2d4} swarms of {@creature swarm of bats||bats} or {@creature swarm of rats||rats}, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call {@dice 3d6} {@creature giant centipede||giant centipedes} instead. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Keresta és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: Kol'daan fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws or sparring sword.

items.name: Sparring Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Metal Immunity
entries: The lava child can move through metal without hindrance, and it has advantage on attack rolls against any creature wearing metal armor or using a metal shield.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lava child fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Living Unseen Servant
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)
languages: understands one language (usually Common) però no pot parlar

trait.name: Invisibilitat
entries: The unseen servant is {@condition invisible}.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 dany contundent.

monster.name: Mad Gòlem

items.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

languages: and Undercommon però no pot parlar

items.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}{@damage 2d6 + 2} de dany perforant, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitució saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead {@condition poisoned} for 5 ({@dice 1d10}) minutes and {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

items.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Marta té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition charmed} i no pot patir son màgicament

items.name: Blind Eye
entries: Due to poor depth perception, Mobar has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Muiral és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 13. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Muiral falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Muiral fa tres atacs: two with his longsword and one with his sting.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Fiblar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Cast Cantrip
entries: Muiral casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Lunging Attack (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Muiral makes one longsword attack that has a abast of 10 feet.

legendary.name: Retreating Strike (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Muiral moves up to his speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat. Before the move, he can make one longsword attack.

items.name: Raig d'Ull
entries: The zombie uses a random magical eye ray, choosing a target that it can see within 60 feet of it.

items.name: 1. Paralyzing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 2. Fear Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 3. Enervation Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany necròtic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: 4. Telekinetic Ray.
items.entry: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Força saving throw, or the zombie moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. It is restrained by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the zombie's next turn or until the zombie is incapacitated. If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The zombie can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or container.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troglodyte fa dos atacs d'Urpa.

items.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}{@damage 2d6 + 4} de dany perforant.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The generator makes two fist attacks or four dart attacks.

items.name: Magic Dard
entries: The generator hurls a magic dart at a target it can see up to 60 feet away from it. The dart hits its target automatically (no attack roll required) for 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de força.

trait.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The weird is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in toxic brew.

trait.name: Brew Bound
entries: The weird dies if forced to leave the basin of toxic brew it inhabits, or if a {@spell purificar menjar i beure} spell is cast on the brew.

trait.name: Poisonous Body
entries: A creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí a l'inici de cada torn seu while {@condition grappled} by a poison weird.

items.name: Erm de l'Ombra Despair
entries: Portia suffers from Erm de l'Ombra despair manifesting as unshakable dread. Until the despair ends, she has disadvantage on all saving throws and gains the following flaw: "I'm convinced that I'm going to die in Vanrakdoom." Portia can attempt to end her despair each time she finishes a long rest, doing so with a successful DC 15 Saviesa saving throw. A {@spell apaivagar emocions} spell also ends her despair, as does any spell or other magical effect that removes a curse.

reaction.name: Rajos d'Ull
entries: As a bonus action or a reaction, Preeta can shoot one of the following eye rays at un objectiu she can see within 120 feet of her:

items.name: Fear Ray.
items.entry: The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: Paralyzing Ray.
items.entry: The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

legendary.name: Lesser Magic
entries: The behir casts {@spell esprai de colors} or {@spell sleep}, sense requerir components.

legendary.name: Greater Magic (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The behir casts {@spell invisibility} or {@spell pas boira}, sense requerir components.

trait.name: Absorbir Electricitat
entries: Whenever the scaladar is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage, and its sting deals an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany elèctric fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Scaladar Link
entries: The scaladar knows the location of other scaladar within 100 feet of it, and it can sense when any of them take damage.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The scaladar fa tres atacs: two with its claws and one with its sting.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar). The scaladar has two claws, each of which can grapple un objectiu.

action.name: Fiblar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany elèctric.

monster.name: Shadow Assassin
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The assassin pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Sigil de l'Ombra
entries: Quan és dins de llum tènua o de foscor the assassin can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: the assassin té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, ability checks, and saving throws.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The assassin makes two Fulla d'Ombres attacks.

action.name: Fulla d'Ombres
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic. Unless the target is immune to necrotic damage, the target's Força score is reduced by {@dice 1d4} each time it is hit by this attack. The target dies if its Força is reduced to 0. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a shadow (see the Monster Manual) rises from the corpse {@dice 1d4} hours later.

items.name: Canviaformes
entries: The roper can use its action to polymorph into a stone object or back to its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

monster.name: Shockerstomper
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Disable
entries: When a leg es queda a 0 punts de cop, it is disabled, and Shockerstomper can use a reaction to detach it from its main body. Whenever one of its legs is disabled, Shockerstomper's walking speed is reduced by 10 feet. The whole contraption topples over and shuts down if four of its seven legs are disabled.

trait.name: Electrified Surface
entries: A creature that ends its turn in contact with Shockerstomper's body (saucer or turrets) ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: Shockerstomper és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Control Module
entries: A creature atop or above Shockerstomper's platform can locate its control module with a successful {@dc 15} Intel·ligència (Investigation) check or Saviesa (Percepció) check. Com a acció, a character can try to open the control module's access panel, either by tearing it off with a successful {@dc 25} Força (Atletisme) check or by dislodging it with thieves' tools and a successful {@dc 25} Destresa check. Behind the panel, embedded in the floor of the control module, is a 5-foot-diameter pulsating crystal hemisphere with AC 10, 25 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. Destroying the crystal hemisphere shuts down Shockerstomper.

trait.name: Lightning Turret
entries: A character can try to plug the nozzle of a lightning turret with a 10-pound rock or similar object, doing so with a successful {@dc 15} Força (Atletisme) check. A plugged turret can't shoot lightning until a creature uses an action to try to clear the obstruction, which requires another successful {@dc 15} Força ({@skill Atletisme}) check. Shockerstomper has no ability to clear an obstruction itself.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Shockerstomper makes three Lightning Turret attacks and two Stomp attacks.

action.name: Lightning Turret
entries: The turret shoots a magical lightning bolt at one creature within 60 feet of Shockerstomper. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 44 ({@damage 8d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

items.name: Spider Features
entries: While cursed with spider features, Shunn can climb difficult surfaces, even across ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

items.name: Alèns d'Atac {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Alè Àcid.
items.entry: The dragon exhala àcid en una línia de 60 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia must make a DC 18 Destresa saving throw. Qui falli rep 58 ({@damage 13d8}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Paralyzing Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales paralyzing gas en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a DC 20 Constitució saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: Magic Theft
entries: Com a acció bonus, the gòlem targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Carisma saving throw, or all magic items in its possession are teleported to the bottom of the pit in {@adventure area 31|WDMM|15|31. Hall of Embers}.

monster.name: Stonecloak
languages: and Undercommon però no pot parlar

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: Thwad fa tres atacs with his maul or his shortbow.

items.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany contundent, mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent if Thwad has more than half of his total hit points remaining.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Trenzia és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). She requires no somatic or material components to cast its spells. Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Trenzia uses Lightning Ray twice.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany elèctric.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Trobriand is an 18th-level spellcaster. His habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Necrotic Absorption
entries: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to necrotic damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

monster.name: Vertrand Shadowdusk
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

walk.condition: (climb 30 ft. fly 60 ft. in bat or hybrid form)

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The werebat can use its action to polymorph into a Medium bat-humanoid hybrid, or into a Large giant bat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Echolocation (Només en forma de Bat or Hybrid)
entries: The werebat has visió a cegues out to a range of 60 feet as long as it's not {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Oïda Aguda
entries: The werebat té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin l'oïda.

trait.name: Nimble Escape (Només en Forma Humanoide)
entries: The werebat can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the werebat té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack (Només en forma de Humanoid or Hybrid)
entries: En forma d'humanoide, the werebat makes two scimitar attacks or two shortbow attacks. En forma híbrida, it can make one bite attack and one scimitar attack.

action.name: Mossegada (Només en forma de Bat or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, and the werebat gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt. If the target is a humanoid, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10} or be cursed with werebat lycanthropy.

action.name: Scimitar (Només en forma de Humanoid or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Shortbow (Només en forma de Humanoid or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Wooden Donkey
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Zalthar wields a {@item nine lives stealer} longsword with 5 charges remaining.

items.name: Nine Lives Stealer Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) de dany tallant, o 12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany necròtic.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Augrek has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: If Zorak isn't in sunlight or running water, he can use his action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into his true form.

While in bat form, Zorak can't speak, his walking speed is 5 feet, and he has una velocitat de vol de 30 peus. His statistics, other than his size and speed, are unchanged. Anything he is wearing transforms with it, but nothing he is carrying does. He reverts to his true form if he dies.

While in mist form, Zorak can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. He is weightless, has una velocitat de vol de 20 peus, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and he can't pass through water. He has advantage on Força, Destresa, and Constitució saving throws, and he is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage he takes from sunlight.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Zorak falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Misty Escape
entries: When he es queda a 0 punts de cop outside his resting place, Zorak transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling {@condition unconscious}, provided that he isn't in sunlight or running water. If he can't transform, he is destroyed.

While he has 0 hit points in mist form, he can't revert to his vampire form, and he must abast his resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in his resting place, he reverts to his vampire form. He is then {@condition paralyzed} until he regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in his resting place with 0 hit points, he regains 1 hit point.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Zorak recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si he has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If Zorak rep dany radiant o d'aigua beneïda, aquest tret no funciona fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: Zorak pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: Zorak has the following flaws:
{@i Prohibició.} Zorak can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} Zorak takes 20 acid damage if he ends his turn in running water.

{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into Zorak's heart while Zorak is {@condition incapacitated} in his resting place, Zorak is {@condition paralyzed} until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} Zorak takes 20 radiant damage when he starts his turn in sunlight. he té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar and ability checks.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Zorak fa dos atacs with his {@item dwarven thrower}, only one of which can be a ranged attack.

action.name: Dwarven Thrower
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) de dany contundent, o 12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dos mans to make a melee attack. On a ranged attack that hits, the hammer deals an extra {@dice 1d8} de dany contundent ({@dice 2d8} if the target is a giant). {@i Hit or Miss:} If thrown, the weapon flies back to Zorak's hand after the attack.

action.name: Multiattack (Només en forma de Vampire)
entries: Zorak fa dos atacs, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Unarmed Strike (Només en forma de Vampire)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. Instead of dealing damage, Zorak can grapple the target ({@dc 18} per escapar).

action.name: Mossegada (Només en forma de Bat or Vampire)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura voluntària o una criatura que estigui {@condition grappled} by Zorak, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic. Els punts de cop màxims de l'objectiu es redueixen tant com dany necròtic hagi rebut, and Zorak regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces his hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a {@creature vampire spawn} under Zorak's control.

action.name: Charm
entries: Zorak targets one humanoid he can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see Zorak, the target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} against this magic or be {@condition charmed} by Zorak. The {@condition charmed} target regards Zorak as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under Zorak's control, it takes Zorak's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for Zorak's bite attack.

Each time Zorak or Zorak's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until Zorak is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

action.name: Children of the Night (1/Dia)
entries: Zorak magically calls {@dice 2d4} swarms of {@creature swarm of bats||bats} or {@creature swarm of rats||rats}, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, Zorak can call {@dice 3d6} {@creature wolf||wolves} instead. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of Zorak and obeying his spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until Zorak dies, or until Zorak dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: Zorak moves up to his speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

legendary.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: Zorak makes one unarmed strike.

legendary.name: Mossegada (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Zorak makes one bite attack.
